parameters.pythonCode:
import re

products = []

for page in _items:
  url = page["json"]["url"]
  
  for product in page["json"]["data"]:
    split = product.split("\n\n")
    name = split[0]

    # 價格 (兩件特價則取平均)，轉成 int
    price = split[-1]
    m = re.search(r"\d+", price)
    price = int(m.group()) if m else None

    # 規格
    spec = name.split("(", 1)[1]

    if "(" in spec:
      # 多個括號
      spec = "(" + spec

    else:
      spec = spec[:-1]
    
    products.append({
        "name": name.split("(", 1)[0],
        "price": price,
        "spec": spec,
        # "splilt": split,
        "url": url,
    })
  
return products

return data

base_url = "https://www.simplemart.com.tw/"
products = []

for product in _items[0]["json"]["data"]:
  split = product.split("\n")

  name = split[0].replace("【", "").replace("】", "")
  spec = split[1].split("規格：")[-1]
  url = base_url + split[2].replace("[", "").replace("]", "")

  products.append({
    # "ID",  # Primary key
    "CRAWLER_NAME": "美廉社新品",
    "REQUEST_URL": url,
    "SOURCE": "爬蟲",
    "RETAILER": "WebCrawler_Simplemart",
    "PRODUCT_NAME": name,
    "CATEGORY": "",
    "MANUFACTURER": "",
    "BRAND": "",
    "SPEC": spec,
    "PRICE": None,
    "PROMO": "",
    "NEW": 0,
    "STATUS": "",
    # "CREATE_DATE",  # SQL 自動產生
    # "CREATE_USER_ID",  # SQL 自動產生
  })

return products

nodes.name: 取得第一頁內容 url，避免 memory 過載

parameters.pythonCode:
base_url = "https://online.carrefour.com.tw"
result = []

for item in _items:
  names = item["json"]["name"]
  prices = item["json"]["price"]
  specs= item["json"]["spec"]
  urls = item["json"]["url"]
  
  for name, price, spec, url in zip(names, prices, specs, urls):
    # 刪除品名的備註
    name = name.split("※實際到貨效")[0]
    name = name.split("到貨效期")[0]
    
    # 價格取整數
    price = int(''.join(filter(str.isdigit, price)))

    # 組 url
    url = base_url + url
                        
    result.append({
      "name": name,
      "price": price,
      "spec": spec,  
      "url": url,
    })
    
return result

import re

data = []

for item in _items:
  names = item["json"]["name"]
  prices = item["json"]["price"]
  details= item["json"]["detail"]
  urls = item["json"]["url"]
  
  for name, price, detail, url in zip(names, prices, details, urls):
    # 品名
    name = name.replace("【愛買】", "")
    
    # 規格
    spec = ""
    pattern = r"(\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(ml|l|g|kg)"
    match = re.search(pattern, name, re.IGNORECASE)
    
    if match:
      spec = match.group(0).lower()
      
      # 品名
      name = name.replace(match.group(0), "")
    
    data.append({
      "name": name,
      "price": price,
      "spec": spec,
      "promo": detail,
      "url": url,
    })
    
return data

for item in _items:
